item.text: After we had safely reached shore, we learned that the island was called Malta.

The <st data-num="915" class="">local inhabitants</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3930" class="">showed</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="3756 5177">extraordinary</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5363" class="">kindness</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> they <st data-num="681" class="">built</st> a <st data-num="4443" class="">fire</st> and <st data-num="4355" class="">welcomed</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> it had <st data-num="2186" class="">started</st> to <st data-num="5205" class="">rain</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="5592" class="">cold</st>.

When <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> had <st data-num="4962" class="">gathered</st> a <st data-num="4128" class="">bundle</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> <st data-num="5434" class="">brushwood</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="2007" class="">putting</st> it <st data-num="1909">on</st> the <st data-num="4443" class="">fire</st>, a <st data-num="2191" class="">viper</st> <st data-num="1831">came out</st> <st data-num="575" class="">because of</st> the <st data-num="2329" class="">heat</st> and <st data-num="2510" class="">fastened</st> itself <st data-num="2510" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>.

<st data-num="5613" class="">When</st> the <st data-num="915">local people</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="2342" class="">creature</st> <st data-num="2910" class="">hanging</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846">Paul’s</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>, they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st>, “<st data-num="3843">No doubt</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="5406" class="">murderer</st>! Although he has <st data-num="1295" class="">escaped</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st>, <st data-num="1349" class="">Justice</st> herself<n id="3" /> has <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1439" class="">allowed</st> him to <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st>!”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">However</st>,<n id="1" /> Paul<n id="2" /> <st data-num="660" class="">shook</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="2342" class="">creature</st> <st data-num="660" class="">off</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st> and <st data-num="3958" class="">suffered</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">no</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">harm</st>.

But they were expecting that he was going to swell up or suddenly drop dead. So after they had waited a long time and had seen nothing unusual happen to him, they changed their minds and said he was a god.
Now in the region around that place were fields belonging to the chief official of the island, named Publius, who welcomed us and entertained us hospitably as guests for three days.

The <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="4196" class="">Publius</st> <st data-num="2621" class="">lay</st> sick in bed, <st data-num="4912" class="">suffering from</st> <st data-num="4446" class="">fever</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1420" class="">dysentery</st>. <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">went in</st> to see <st data-num="3739" class="">him</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> after <st data-num="4336" class="">praying</st>, <st data-num="2007" class="">placed</st><n id="3" /> his <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> on <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2390" class="">healed</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

After <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> had <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st>, many of the <st data-num="3062" class="">people</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3520" class="">island</st> who <st data-num="2192" class="">were</st> <st data-num="769" class="">sick</st><n id="1" /> also <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> were <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st>.<n id="2" />
They also bestowed many honors, and when we were preparing to sail, they gave us all the supplies we needed.
After three months we put out to sea in an Alexandrian ship that had wintered at the island and had the “Heavenly Twins” as its figurehead.

We <st data-num="2609">put in</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> <st data-num="4946" class="">Syracuse</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="1961" class="">stayed</st> there <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>.

From <st data-num="3606" class="">there</st> we <st data-num="4014">cast off</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="2658" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> <st data-num="4484" class="">Rhegium</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> a <st data-num="3558">south wind</st> <st data-num="1920">sprang up</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> on the <st data-num="1206">second day</st> we <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4223" class="">Puteoli</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="3757" class="">There</st><n id="1" /> we <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st><n id="2" /> some <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st><n id="3" /> and were <st data-num="3870" class="">invited</st> to <st data-num="1961" class="">stay</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3779">in this way</st> we <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4516" class="">Rome</st>.<n id="4" />

The <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="2547">from there</st>,<n id="1" /> when they <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="891">as far as</st> the <st data-num="5410" class="">Forum</st> of <st data-num="675" class="">Appius</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">Three</st> <st data-num="4999" class="">Taverns</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="529" class="">meet</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>. When he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> them,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="2168" class="">thanked</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> and <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> <st data-num="2294" class="">courage</st>.
When we entered Rome, Paul was allowed to live by himself, with the soldier who was guarding him.

After three days Paul called the local Jewish leaders together. When they had assembled, he said to them, “Brothers, although I had done nothing against our people or the customs of our ancestors, from Jerusalem I was handed over as a prisoner to the Romans.

When<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3748">they</st> had <st data-num="350" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="350" class="">case</st>,<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="1014" class="">wanted</st> to <st data-num="630" class="">release</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> there was <st data-num="3367" class="">no</st> <st data-num="156" class="">basis</st> for a <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> <st data-num="5225" class="">sentence</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="483" class="">objected</st>,<n id="1" /> I was <st data-num="315" class="">forced</st> to <st data-num="1941" class="">appeal</st> to <st data-num="2541" class="">Caesar</st><n id="2" />—<st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5613">that</st> I <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="2723">charge to bring</st><n id="3" /> against <st data-num="1473" class="">my own</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">people</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="1223">for</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="156">reason</st> I have <st data-num="3870" class="">asked</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4354" class="">speak with</st> you, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> I am <st data-num="4029" class="">bound</st> with <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="254" class="">chain</st> <st data-num="1752" class="">because of</st> the <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>.”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3588">They</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1473">We</st> have <st data-num="1209" class="">received</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">no</st> <st data-num="1121" class="">letters</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> have <st data-num="5100" class="">any</st> of the <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="3854" class="">come</st> from there<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="518" class="">reported</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">said</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">bad</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.
But we would like to hear from you what you think, for regarding this sect we know that people everywhere speak against it.”

They set a day to meet with him, and they came to him where he was staying in even greater numbers. From morning until evening he explained things to them, testifying about the kingdom of God and trying to convince them about Jesus from both the law of Moses and the prophets.

<st data-num="3588" class="">Some</st> were <st data-num="3982" class="">convinced</st><n id="1" /> by what he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">others</st> <st data-num="569" class="">refused<n id="3" /> to believe</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> they began to <st data-num="630" class="">leave</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="800">unable to agree</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">among</st> <st data-num="240" class="">themselves</st>, after <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="3004">made</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> last <st data-num="4487" class="">statement:</st> “The <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="2573" class="">rightly</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="2268" class="">Isaiah</st>

when he said,

‘Go to this people and say,

“You will keep on hearing, but will never understand,

and you will keep on looking, but will never perceive.

For the heart of this people has become dull,

and their ears are hard of hearing,

and they have closed their eyes,

so that they would not see with their eyes

and hear with their ears

and understand with their heart

and turn, and I would heal them.”’
“Therefore be advised that this salvation from God has been sent to the Gentiles; they will listen!”
Paul lived there two whole years in his own rented quarters and welcomed all who came to him,
proclaiming the kingdom of God and teaching about the Lord Jesus Christ with complete boldness and without restriction.
